readOnlyMode: Read Only Mode Set Backup Key to continue sending and receiving {{CeloDollars}}
failedFetchMnemonic: Failed to fetch your Backup Key

backupKeyImportance.0: Your Backup Key controls access ot your Celo Wallet. It is very important to keep this Key safe.
backupKeyImportance.1: If you lose your phone or delete the Celo app, you will lose access to your Celo {{dollars}} and Gold.

toDo: To make sure your funds stay safe, you'll need to do the following:
allDone: You've successfully backed up your Key! Check back here to view it at any time.
backupKeyConfirmation: In the future, if you lose your phone you will need to provide this Backup Key to enable your account to be recovered. To confirm that you have your Backup Key written down, please enter it below:

backupSkipText.0: Without a Backup Key, you can lose access to your wallet

backupRecovery: Share your Backup Key with only one other person who you completely trust.
securityTip: Please do not take a screenshot or save it in your phone's notes. Keep your Backup Key somewhere you can access if you lose your phone.

backupKeySummary.0: Write this phrase down on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe.
backupKeySummary.1: Donâ€™t show your phrase to anyone else. They can access your wallet if they see it.

heresYourKey: Here is your Backup Key. Remember, keep this safe.
socialBackupYourKey: Recovery Secrets allow you to recover your account with the help of two friends. If you lose your Backup Key, you will need to contact your friends and enter both Recovery Secrets.
sendFirstHalf: First, send this recovery secret to one contact:
sendSecondHalf: Now, send this second recovery secret to another contact:
questionPhrase: Which of these words is in your Backup Key?
backToKey: We will take you back to the screen with your backup key so that you ensure you wrote it down correctly.

bothBackupsDone.1: You're all done! If you would like to review your recovery secrets, you can always return here later.

dontLoseIt: Please do not lose this key. It is critical that you maintain this in a safe place, as this is the only way to unlock your wallet should you lose your phone.
whatsappMessage:
Important: please keep this private. 

I'm sending you the Backup Phrase to my Celo Wallet:
backupPrompt: For the security of your funds, your account is frozen until you get your Backup Key
